name: The Office (itch) (ikerdi_, Aaronar_gd, Manuel Rincón)
description:
The Office is a experimental Magic Realism Walking Simulator where you discover new words and combinations for your computer program that can change the reality and entrophy of the office.

[Under development]

Controls:

In-Game Desktop:

Left Click in the textbox to write.

Hold Right Click and Move to look around in the desktop

Movement when you leave desktop:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

E - Learn Words

Game Developed and Designed by:

Manuel Rincón

Aarón Asensio

Iker Díaz
